original: intros. unfold gt. intros H. apply count_occ_In in H. apply list_exists_DM in H. destruct H as [y [H1 H2]]. apply in_split in H1. destruct H1 as [A1 [A2 H1]]. rewrite H1. apply equi_push. apply rep_in with (x:= x) in H2. apply rep_cons with (x:= y) in H2. rewrite H2. apply in_or_app. left. rewrite countSplit in H. rewrite H2 in H. omega. rewrite H2. auto. auto.
